up.description: Mobile device size. Represents the maximum of the width array in this breakpoint.

down.description: Mobile device size. Represents the minimum of the width array in this breakpoint.

up.description: Small tablet or potrait size. Represents the maximum of the width array in this breakpoint.

down.description: Small tablet or potrait size. Represents the minimum of the width array in this breakpoint.

up.description: Medium tablet or small desktop size. Represents the maximum of the width array in this breakpoint.

down.description: Medium tablet or small desktop size. Represents the minimum of the width array in this breakpoint.

up.description: Medium desktop size. Represents the maximum of the width array in this breakpoint.

down.description: Medium desktop size. Represents the minimum of the width array in this breakpoint.

up.description: Large desktop size (1080p+). Represents the maximum of the width array in this breakpoint.

down.description: Large desktop size (1080p+). Represents the minimum of the width array in this breakpoint.
